name: Found Again - The hardest thing I've ever been through
name_original: Found Again - The hardest thing I've ever been through
description:
A game created as my final project for a Games & Graphics course, based on my experience going through an existential crisis at the start of this year. 

You play as Beverly, a young girl who has been suppressing intrusive thoughts for a while now, only for them to become too powerful to contain, completely taking over her mind. She now has to face the very thing she fears most in order to become found again.

This is my first ever project with Unity, and I was given a timeframe of 10 weeks to create it.
